item.title: Just a test
item.description:
For a while, nothing has been written on this blog. Because of that, I forgot how to write. We are using files with .rst extension. I looked it up on the internet and i learnt that it stands for reStructuredText. Wikipedia has some examples on it. Here are some:

item.title: TC SRM144 DIV2 200pts C++
item.description:
In this question we are given an integer, seconds. And the question asked us to return it in the hours:minutes:seconds format. The given integer, seconds, is between 0 and 86399.

I defined 3 integers: hour, min, sec. I assigned seconds%60 to sec in order to find the …
